summary: Comprehensive testing of EASY MONEY platform RTP functionality, admin controls, deposits, and promo codes. Found critical RTP validation issue but core functionality working correctly.

critical_bugs.issue: System accepts invalid RTP values outside 10-99.9% range
critical_bugs.impact: Admin can set RTP values like 0%, 5%, 100%, 150% which breaks game economics
critical_bugs.details: Backend accepts RTP values below 10% and above 99.9%, no validation implemented in /admin/settings endpoint

critical_bugs.issue: RTP changes not properly affecting game outcomes
critical_bugs.impact: High RTP (95%) giving 0% wins, Low RTP (20%) giving 5-10% wins - formula may be inverted or broken
critical_bugs.details: Dice and Bubbles games showing unexpected win rates that don't correlate with RTP settings

moderate_issues.impact: Cannot test promo code wager system functionality
moderate_issues.details: POST /admin/promo endpoint returning errors, may need different parameters

working_correctly.details: All RTP values (dice_rtp: 85.5, mines_rtp: 90.0, tower_rtp: 88.5, bubbles_rtp: 92.0, crash_rtp: 87.0, x100_rtp: 89.5) correctly saved and retrieved
Admin manual deposit correctly updates deposit_balance from 1000.0 to 1100.0
System correctly accepts valid RTP values (10%, 50%, 95%, 99.9%)

ui_bugs.issue: Game results not showing in UI after dice rolls
ui_bugs.details: Dice game plays but result element not found or not displaying win/loss information

working_correctly.details: Admin login successful, all sections (–°—Ç–∞—Ç–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∞, RTP, –ü–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–∏, –í—ã–≤–æ–¥—ã, –ü—Ä–æ–º–æ–∫–æ–¥—ã, –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞) accessible
6 RTP sliders visible for all games (Dice: 95%, Mines: 90%, Bubbles: 95%, Tower: 88.5%, Crash: 80%, X100: 89.5%) with correct range 10-99.9%
RTP sliders can be changed and saved successfully
Demo login successful, games accessible, balance updates correctly (909.80‚ÇΩ)
Mines game fully functional - user can start game, click cells, find safe spots, and cash out winnings (20.20‚ÇΩ)
All game pages (Dice, Mines, Tower, Crash, Bubbles, X100) accessible from navigation

passed_tests: RTP settings persistence across all 6 games
Valid RTP values (10-99.9%) accepted by system
Admin panel RTP interface fully functional
RTP sliders can be modified and saved
Demo user login and game access
